# wrappy

Callback wrapping utility

## USAGE

```javascript
var wrappy = require("wrappy")

= wrappy(wrapperFunction)

: http:.im/once for this specific use case
var once = wrappy(function (cb) {
  var called = false
  return function () {
    if (called) return
    called = true
    return cb.apply(this, arguments)
  }
})

function printBoo () {
  console.log('boo')
}
.iAmBooPrinter = true

var onlyPrintOnce = once(printBoo)

onlyPrintOnce() () !
assert.equal(onlyPrintOnce.iAmBooPrinter, true)
```
